title: Inesa Kochur
text: “The artwork “Open” represents a traditional doorknob in theform of a hand which one can spot on the entrances of ancient buildings in Seville. The color palette of gold and black gives a touch of royalty and aristocracy. “

title: Miguel Valdayo Boza
text: “This work, made by the painter Elena, presents us with apainting full of meaning and with multiple readings, all of them interconnected in a general whole that tells us about the cultural heritage that we enjoy in Andalusia and wonderfully resolved in a format in which each and every one of the elements that define the work is easily identifiable.”

title: Inesa Kochur
text: “An art piece “Gold of Andalusia” is a visual poem, which carries a lot of symbolic value and leaves the observer absorbing the richness of its meaning. Here the painter has chosen to dedicate few characters to the cultural heritage of Seville. Here is warm palette with deep old gold invite us to travel in history. Female figures which appear on the painting are a tribute to the mysterious and passionate dance of Andalucía - flamenco. Accurate and exquisite details of traditional hairstyles and adornment serve not only as a powerful symbol of fruitfulness of life in the south of Spain, but also reveal the mastery of a brush of the author. “

title: Miguel Valdayo Boza
text: “In this captivating work of art by the artist Elena Salova, the viewer is immersed in a world in which different cultures, places and moments converge in one canvas. The painting is presented in a large format, allowing a panoramic view of the scene and providing enough space for the abundance of details that appear in every square inch.”
